DESCRIPTION: Burned creatures increase the damage of the players next attack when damaged and #yBurn is removed.
Applies half of the cards offensive effects to all enemies in addition to it's target
#yExhaust up to X cards, then reduce this amount by the number of cards Exhausted. Once this reaches 0, this card becomes Transfigured
#yDraconic cards have their damage and #yBlock values increased by #yDragonscales. NL #yDraconic Sigils have their values increased by #yDragonscales
Improves #yDragonic #ySigils and damage and #yBlock values of #yDraconic cards.
#yTransfuse effects occur when this card goes to the Exhaust pile
#yScarlet #yRot deals damage equal to #b50% of it's owner's #yPoison.
#yStorm Sigils will damage monsters with Arc Conduit in addition to other targets.
Places a #yDraconic #ySigil on this cards target of the specified type
Places a #yDraconic Sigil on the player of the specified type.
Takes your leading #yDraconic #ySigil and places it on enemies this card effects.
Takes the leading #yDraconic Sigil form this cards target and places it on the player
#yDraconic #ySigil : Grants #yVigor while on the player. Damages it's owner when on an enemy.
#yDraconic #ySigil : Damages the enemy you last targeted directly while on the player. Applies #yArc #yConduit then #yEngrafts when on an enemy
#yDraconic #ySigil : Grants #yBlock while on the player. Applies Frostbite to it's owner when on an enemy.
#yDraconic #ySigil : Applies #yPoison to random enemies while on the player. Applies #yRot to it's owner when on an enemy.
#yDraconic #ySigil : Damages random enemies and increase damage and block gained from this once #yEngraved while on the player. Damages all enemies and grants #yBlock to the player on an enemy
